entry.title: Version 1.2.0
entry.summary: Updated to support Spirit of Fire missions + other misc tweaks
entry.markdown:
Version 1.2.0
[Major Changes]
= Transport powers uncapped = Five. Hundred. Pelicans.
= Covenant Leader Power wheel = The Covenant now have access to a leader power wheel, and can use Heal & Repair as well as Spirit Transport.
= New Skull: Turbo Powers - Replaces Emperor = Skull Effects: SIGNIFICANTLY reduces the time needed for leader powers to recharge. Final Score significantly decreased.
[Misc Changes] > Score multiplier from Turbo Mode is now significantly reduced. > Turbo Mode now works properly on the Spirit of Fire missions by allowing the Power Core to generate additional income. > Turbo mode now also affects the research time of the Adrenaline upgrade. > Covenant now has access to the Reserves upgrade. > Tweaked AI file to be more responsive
